listing.name: DotZero AI Tools
listing.shortDescription: MCP servers and skills for DotZero manufacturing systems
listing.longDescription: A comprehensive collection of MCP servers and Claude Code skills for integrating with DotZero manufacturing systems. Includes Work Order API integration for managing production work orders, products, workers, routes, operations, devices, quality control, warehouse, and WMS. Offers both native MCP integration (98 tools) and cross-platform REST API skills.

features.title: Dual-Track Architecture
features.description: Choose between native MCP integration (98 tools) or cross-platform REST API skills

features.title: Work Order Management
features.description: Create, read, update, and delete work orders with full filtering and pagination

features.title: Product & Route Management
features.description: Manage products, production routes, and route operations

features.title: Operation Tracking
features.description: Track operation history, generate reports, and view analytics

features.title: Quality Control
features.description: Manage defect reasons, abnormal history, and quality categories

features.title: Warehouse & WMS
features.description: Warehouse management, storage locations, inventory checks, and stock monitoring

features.title: Token Management
features.description: Automatic token storage and refresh via .dotzero/ directory
